alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 3:44AM EST until January 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and sleet expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock, and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread drifting and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
